title.rendered: Order Your Maple Avenue Middle School Yearbook Now!

content.rendered:
Order Your Maple Avenue Middle School 2023-2024 Yearbook Now!
The cost of a yearbook is $14.00 plus tax. The Yearbooks are soft cover and will arrive in late Spring. Yearbooks are only for sale until February 29th and they are Pre-Order only through the following link: https://jostensyearbooks.com/?REF=A01005038
